verses.text: Prayer for deliverance and guidance. ¶ A Psalm of David.¶ Hear my prayer, O Jehovah; give ear to my supplications: In thy faithfulness answer me, in thy righteousness.

And enter not into judgment with thy servant;
    For in thy sight no man living is righteous.
Therefore [a]is my spirit overwhelmed within me; My heart within me is desolate.

I spread forth my hands unto thee:
    My soul  after thee, as a weary land.

Make haste to answer me, O Jehovah; my spirit faileth:
    Hide not thy face from me,
    Lest I become like them that go down into the pit.
Deliver me, O Jehovah, from mine enemies: [b]I flee unto thee to hide me.

footnotes.c: Or, Let thy good Spirit lead me

verses.text:
Quicken me, O Jehovah, for thy name’s sake:
    In thy righteousness bring my soul out of trouble.
